name: i-have-request
description: Represents a BACnet I-Have service request, used by a device to announce that it contains a particular object, typically in response to a Who-Has service request.

fields.name: device-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier of the device that contains the object.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier of the object being announced.

fields.name: object-name
fields.description: The name of the object being announced.
